entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, I need to return something. I'm already annoyed, so let's make this quick.
I understand your frustration. I'll do my best to make this a smooth process for you. Can you tell me what item you're looking to return?
It's a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it, like, two weeks ago. It's just not working out for me.
Okay, I can help you with a return for your VeloBand Pulse. To confirm, you purchased it about 15 days ago, correct?
Yes! 15 days. So can I return it or what? I don’t have all day.
Absolutely! Our standard return policy is 90 days, so you're well within that window. Let me just pull up your order information. One moment please…
Ninety days? Really? Good, because I was worried. I don't understand why companies make it so difficult to return things.

I understand. We try to make the return process as simple as possible for our customers. Okay, I've located your order. I'm initiating the return process for your VeloBand Pulse now. You’ll receive a prepaid shipping label via email within 24 hours. Simply repackage the smart watch in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at your nearest shipping provider.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. Will I get a full refund?

Yes, you will receive a full refund to your original method of payment once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse. You should see the refund reflected in your account within 7-10 business days after we receive the item. Just make sure you send it back within the next 10 days using the shipping label we send.
Perfect! Thank you so much! That was much easier than I expected. I really appreciate it.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

You're welcome! Have a great day! If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to call us back. Sometimes, if there are edge case return requests, your request may require review from a manager, but it looks like this request will be handled quickly.
